From an ecocentric perspective, animals are not considered as having instrumental value for human purposes, but rather are seen as having intrinsic value in their own right. Furthermore, animals offer us the opportunity to appreciate the beauty and diversity of life on Earth, enriching our connection to the environment and fostering a sense of awe and wonder. By respecting and protecting animals and their habitats, we are ultimately safeguarding the intricate web of life that sustains us all.
